data.title: Roux Institute at Northeastern University
data.meta_description: Be part of a bold new model of graduate education and research—designed with companies at the table from day one. Stay competitive.
data.text:
Since our 2020 inception, we’ve awarded over $25 million in scholarships, built a student body of 625 diverse learners (and growing!), and have invited dozens of entrepreneurs and world-class researchers into our community to build innovative solutions for Maine and beyond.

We’re excited to introduce the Roux Institute impact report, a compilation of some of the most important work we’ve done, from inception to date. The report highlights some of our inspiring graduates, delves into collaborations with our industry and community partners, and tells stories about the innovation, research, and community being built at Northeastern’s Roux Institute.

The report highlights our successes to date, but also invigorates us for all that’s yet to come. We’re looking forward to continued partnership with our Maine community!
